channel.title: Kubernetes on Vagrant Ansible Getting Started
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Vagrant Ansible Getting Started

item.title: Getting Started with k3s
item.description: In this hands-on we will work using k3s, it's a lightweight Kubernetes distribution easy to install. We will not work with vanilla kubernetes as its installation could be challenging. Using k3s should not change your experience since we will stay at a beginer level and asics of this distribution work as a vanilla kubernetes. Setup a VM We will use Vagrant to spawn a VM a work with k3s. Vagrant.configure("2") do |config| config.
